title: Anyone else having issues with the Android alarm working with YouTube music?
content: In the past, I was able to select my mixtape from YouTube music. Now, even after I have YouTube music selected as my sound for alarm, nothing happens when the alarm goes off. Spotify works but YouTube music does not. Often when I try to assign you to music as the sound for my alarm, I get the spinning wheel and it tries to load but it doesn't happen
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
